content:
<rule id="javax-to-jakarta-dependencies-00001" xmlns="http://windup.jboss.org/schema/jboss-ruleset">
            <when>
                <filecontent filename="pom.xml" pattern="groupId>javax.{renamed-g}<"/>
            </when>
            <perform>
                    <hint category-id="mandatory" effort="1" title="javax.{renamed-g} groupId has been replaced by jakarta.{renamed-g}">
                        <message>Update the group dependency by replacing the `javax.{renamed-g}` groupId with `jakarta.{renamed-g}`</message>
                        <link href="https://jakarta.ee/" title="Jakarta EE"/>
                        <quickfix name="javax-to-jakarta-pom-dependencies-g" type="REPLACE">
                               <replacement>jakarta</replacement>
                               <search>javax</search>
                        </quickfix>
                    </hint>
            </perform>
            <where param="renamed-g">
                <matches pattern="(annotation|batch|ejb|el|enterprise.concurrent|enterprise.deploy|faces|interceptor|jms|jws|mail|management.j2ee|resource|security.auth.message|security.jacc|servlet|servlet.jsp|servlet.jsp.jstl|transaction|websocket|ws.rs|xml.bind|xml.registry|xml.rpc|xml.soap|xml.ws)"/>
            </where>
        </rule>
